website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive printer that uses WiFi technology, so you can print from any device. Adequate quality for the price.
pros: An extremely versatile machine, handling all kinds of different media and offering scanning, copying, and faxing
cons: Won't print in black if the color ink is low, and ink is expensive

customer_reviews.title: I would not suggest wasting your money
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this printer again!! I’ve had it for 2.5 years and from the beginning it has been more hassle then anything. It streaks and misses large sections of printing frequently. I have to realign and clean the heads almost every other time I use it. This has been a waste of time, paper, and ink. On the topic of ink...it uses a lot and I have to replace the ink more often than seems reasonable. If the ink is registering low it will not allow you to print any longer. So, you aren’t able to print a faded document...it won’t allow that.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: The Printer Prints Fine....When it Works....Which is Almost Never
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this printer for a few years now, and it has been nothing but a headache. It took three tries downloading apps to get my Android device to work. The ink is always drying out and we have to clean the nozzles before each print job no matter how often we us the machine. We just did a firmware update and now it will not recognize any of the ink cartridges. But it was printing just before the firmware update. I would give this printer 0 if that was a star option. Please buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Never Work Right
customer_reviews.text: This unit never worked right from day one. The thing simply refused to print. Constantly replacing ink cartridges only led to printing a few pages, and those only in High Quality Mode. The only satisfaction I had with this machine was throwing it in the dumpster!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph LaCerra

customer_reviews.title: It eats ink like candy...
customer_reviews.text: This was initially a great printer. As an artist, I use it to print references, invoices, etc, and it worked really well for about 6 months. Then it began to eat ink like crazy, and I would get 5-6 full color prints before it told me I needed to replace all the ink cartridges. I stopped using it for a few months, but had to use it again recently and the ink issues have me in the market for a new printer. The ink is too expensive for the number of prints I get from each box.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane

customer_reviews.title: Simple effective...
customer_reviews.text: Printer that is what I'd consider a throw away. Meaning after 1 or 2 ink changes just buy another. Requires all in levels to be functioning in order to print even if only printing using black ink. That stinks but it does print well although it's not exactly fast. Cost of ink is prohibitive some what because after 2 or 3 refills on it you've bought a new printer. Tried low cost non factory in but it didn't like them, any of them. Soo plan on buying factory inks.
customer_reviews.author: Skipster

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: The only time this printer has worked was with the initial shipment of ink. As soon as I needed to replace the ink cartridges I never got a good quality print or any sort of print. I couldn't even print black and white. I can't afford to buy a printer and replace it when I need to replace the ink.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bolzendahl

customer_reviews.title: I hate this printer so much I want to set it on fire
customer_reviews.text: It's always been fussy but when it worked, it did a fine job. However it's gotten to the point that it ALWAYS says the printer can't be found even though I've got it physically connected to my laptop. Constant updates that end up causing the printer to mess up and after spending a damn hour trying to figure out why it wouldn't work this time, it "printed" a faint blue pattern that looks nothing like what I was trying to print. The stupid thing is barely 2 years old but it looks like I'm getting a new one. Definitely won't be Epson though. Stay far away from this printer, it's a horror show.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worst Company No wonder there is a class action lawsuit against them.
customer_reviews.text: I hope they go out of business like so many other companies during this Pandemic. In my opinion Epson is a complete scam, my printer stopped working after year 2, thats with proper care and light usage. I'm a millennial so of course I bought the printer to use only for printing out Amazon labels lol. I tried to call Epson aka Epstein, it was useless and all the American representatives are very rude. Third party ink no longer works and it just damages your printer on purpose. I bought the original ink from Epson and the printer wouldn't work even after several head cleanings and following their stupid directions. I will never buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Joey C.

customer_reviews.title: Dot matrix were more dependable
customer_reviews.text: Hate this printer, a crap shoot whether it will work or not. Chews through ink crazy fast, and since latest update, refuses 3rd party ink, so it's either epson cartridges or nothing. I hate this printer so much it makes me not buy anything tied to this company, including watches, and NO, I don't care if you have tech support for me, your printer is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: H o r r i b l e .
customer_reviews.text: This printer is bad. It’s terrible. I probably used it for less than one month and it stopped printing correctly. I put it away. I’m finally writing a review because I pulled it back out, got new ink, cleaned it up and thought to give it another shot. Nope. Now I remember why I stopped using it. Because it does not work. I repeat... it does NOT work. What a terrible waste of money. I wish I had returned it when I had the chance. So disappointing. Wasted more money on ink hoping to get it to miraculously work again.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Wastes ink like crazy and very poor print quality
customer_reviews.text: I printed off a Minecraft Creeper mask for my son with a brand new set of ink cartridges and it was already out of yellow ink by the end of a page or two. I hate that I wasted money on this thing. I really wish I had bought a laser color printer instead. I really wanted something to complement my black & white laser printer and I thought this would fill in the gaps with color, scanning, and copying but it's a really annoying machine to use. I'm sad.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Phalange

customer_reviews.title: Can’t print black without color
customer_reviews.text: I bought plenty of black ink and multiple over priced replacement cartridges for black. The printer somehow uses color ink to print black and demanda all colors are there to print black. The image quality is medium and not great for high dpi photos. The ink usage is outrageous and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzi

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money these are poorly made chintzy printers that force you to buy their ink
customer_reviews.text: A recent firmware update made this printer useless as far as I'm concerned. I had ink cartridges that I Purchased on Amazon that were supposed to work with this printer and until today when I installed a new firmware update. Now I'm out 40+ dollars I spent on the set. I had only installed one of the black cartridges and it was working just fine until today. I will never ever purchase another Epson product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecah

customer_reviews.title: This printer has everything wrong with a printer
customer_reviews.text: Mechanical problems, software problems, ink cartridge problems. This printer has it all. Owned it for 3 years and think it only printer properly for the first 4 months. Was never the same quality or responsiveness after changing cartridges. Black stopped printing altogether after a while. When I tried to clean the head myself manually (it was my last resort according to the internet) and it bricked the entire unit
customer_reviews.author: Mike Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: Had this printer for about 2 years now. I don't use it often. Just replaced colored ink yesterday and it didn't work when I tried to print something. Went to settings and cleaned the head and nozzle but now the ink levels show that the black is all gone which showed more than 50% yesterday. The colors now show less than full and they were the ones I replaced! Waste of money. Wasted money on ink, my time trying to fix it and etc.
customer_reviews.author: CP84

customer_reviews.title: Subversive and manipulative
customer_reviews.text: This printer is designed to get as much money from you as possible. It refuses to print for a variety of reasons- having low yellow ink when you're printing black, trying to use affordable 3rd party ink cartridges. I can't roll back the firmware to a version where I can ignore low ink roadblocks, I can't print with other brands of ink cartridges- it feels like I don't even own my own printer. Epson is just waiting for me to shell out for expensive OEM cartridges because they program chips on each cartridge to report that they're OEM to the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as you would want a printer to work
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer for about a year now and I have had no problems with it. There are times when I use it alot and I'm just getting low on ink now. I saw a lot of not so good reviews for this printer and it's usage of ink,but it really depends on what your printing. The more color pictures you print the more ink you use. I really like this printer and would tell everyone I know about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the headache, don't buy this printer. Connection problems, keep having to go through the WI-Fi setup . Forgets the internet connection constantly. The APP sucks. Poor printer quality, just starts printing poorly then you have to go thru alignment menus, and try new ink carts to get the quality just to print an EBAY label. STAY AWAY FROM THIS JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyDanger

customer_reviews.title: Works decently, forces you to use proprietary ink
customer_reviews.text: We've had this printer for about a year and a half or so, it works fairly well and scans decently. But we've run into a lot of strange issues over the course of using it. This last week Epson did a firmware update, which then led to us only being able to use the proprietary ink that they sell. So we had to get rid of a bunch of ink that we already spend money on and spend more money just to be able to use the printer more. Maybe this is a common thing now, but I wouldn't recommend getting this for that reason alone.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while...
customer_reviews.text: Sat for while and than never worked properly thereafter. Eats expensive ink doing maintenance. Endless go-round trying to get it to connect to the wireless server. Repeated re-installations and driver downloads resulted in just one good printed page - the "Epson Connect" page at the end of setup. After that, nothing. Support is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Irish McMike

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS OR ANY PRINTERS FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Printer started printing jumbled within a few months and spent a long time on the phone with Epson technician who said it is definitely a hardware problem and needed actual repair. Epson will not honor the warranty because this seller is not an original seller. So we are out all of the money we spent.
customer_reviews.author: GingerSkoot

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, don't purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this printer when I first bought it because of the price. But you will pay and pay for ink cartridges! I just use it once in a while. And if one ink cartridge is empty it will not work. I'm keeping it because like I said I don't print that often. But even then it will show an ink cartridge is empty, not true!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Not a good printer. Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: When new, the printer worked very well. With time, the printhead needed to be cleaned. The recommended cleaning solution caused a short circuit in the printhead . The printer is now useless after less than 3 years. I am extremely disappointed with the extremely short lifespan of this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good printer for 2 1/2 yrs
customer_reviews.text: Used it mainly for printing documents and scanning. it did a good job. My issue began when printing it started to cut off on every other line. I tried cleaning head, aligning and buying new ink. Nothing worked. I researched further and it looks like the roller is bad.
customer_reviews.author: W. Cortes

customer_reviews.title: terrible printer
customer_reviews.text: Initially, this printer worked fine for a few months, then I started having major issues with the print quality. Then it would not print at all. Ink is too expensive & doesn't last long. Then the nozzles get clogged and it won't print even we you do have it filled with ink. I have spent hours trying to get this thing to work, and I give up. Don't waste your time and money!
customer_reviews.author: clm333

customer_reviews.title: Uses a ton of Ink
customer_reviews.text: This has been a huge waste of money for me. The ink costs a mint and this printer uses a lot. Of course there's no generic of this ink in stores, so you sell your first born just for the ink to run low after a couple uses. Who knew cleaning the heads uses ink. I will never buy another Epson again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Noumon

customer_reviews.title: Print Errors
customer_reviews.text: I've had more errors than successes with this printer in the 4 months I've owned and used it. Every time I go to print I have to run the cleaning modes and then still typically get bad prints. It would discourage anyone from buying this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M. Botsford

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a printer for my new side job that requires a lot of document printing. I wanted easy and simple to use because all my printer experiences have been of printers with finicky moods. So I decided to try this one because of the good reviews. My husband has a PC and I have a Mac. The set up was very easy on both. It's Day 1 and no problems so we are good to go!
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: Prints terribly
customer_reviews.text: I've spent hours over the last few years of owning this printer, trying to get the alignment correct so my print-outs would look better. I'm very tech-savvy but I think this printer is just poorly made. I'm finally giving up and ordering a new one now that I'm working from home and need better quality on a regular basis. It hasn't printed normally since the first month of owning it - everything comes out misaligned and hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperNumber9

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the home office that does not require a lot of printing. However if you scan a lot you can only scan one page at a time. Plus if I don't use it for a while I find I need to run it through the "clean" mode and realign the pages. It only takes a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this printer!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this printer for 2.5years. The ink cartridge won’t last that long. The printing was fine at the first whole cartridge change. After that, it won’t print in “black and white color” and the color on the printed pages looks faded. I tried google/youtube if i could find any sources to fix my printer. I tried “cleaning” several times, nope it didn’t work. Its better to buy another printer and get away from this kind of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this printer 3 years. It was great while it worked but now it eats the ink and doesn’t print anything!!!! I tried everything to fix it. I guess it is going in the trash now! Such a waste of $$$!!! There is no lasting quality in these products anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaRB

customer_reviews.title: Even if I could get it to print, it was poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Each time I tried printing, I would need to run through various maintenance checks. Even then, portions of the page were dropped. These were all documents with perhaps some graphics, but I don't print photos. This is without exaggeration ... if I print today, and then tomorrow ... both days, I would need to run nozzle cleaning, check the alignment, et cetera. The machine itself is a nice size, but feels cheaply made. Without a doubt, the worst printer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down in a couple months
customer_reviews.text: This printer start printing haywire images a couple of months in; you either need to align the heads frequently or run other tech. It wasted ink and time, and the problem would come back within a couple of uses. Tech support was not very helpful and told you to run the same fixes I had already run, hundreds of time before. They ultimately sent a replacement, which also started malfunctioning a couple of months into use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has never printed correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I use my printer infrequently and so I thought the problem might be that the ink had dried up but that is never the problem. I have had a tech savvy friend get it working for me ok and then not long after that the printing is terrible and hardly legible. Too much time has passed for me to return it so I will just consider it a loss. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: kswbkdb

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Printed 5 copies and ran out of ink. Bought more and crashed. Had a hard time keeping it attached to my network. Set up was easy and had to reset it regularly.wish I'd kept my old wired printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST GARBAGE PRINTER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This printer is a piece of JUNK. Used it for a few months, and it stopped printing. Nothing i could see went wrong. I bought new ink cartridges and still did not print. WASTE OF $$$$$$$$
customer_reviews.author: RichiePoo

customer_reviews.title: Worst Printer - Total Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Every single time I want to print, I have to print three or four pages, clean the printer heads, and then realign the printer heads, before I can print a page. Cheap cheap cheap. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Katy G.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst printer it runs out of color ink when ive been using black. I cant use the printer unless all the colors are full . Customer service gives me the run around . Not good
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: most expensive printer!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I am not mistaken, this is one of the worst printers to have. It constantly says that i am out of ink when I just installed a fresh batch of ink cartridges. the ink is so expensive that not even Costco can help you out with their refillable ones. Ink dries up quick through out its time in the printer. Overall WORST printer I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: worldsguard

customer_reviews.title: Worst printer
customer_reviews.text: Worst printer. Replacement cartridges don't work. Tried with several ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Printer created by man kind.
customer_reviews.text: After the first month of usage, the printer started to print out missing segments. The black ink will always be fading. Then I decided to buy the print head cleaning solution off of amazon thinking that I will be able to fix it. However, the same problem came back and the printer is not functioning. Definitely tossing this one into the garbage where it belongs. Completely waste of money and time for attempting to fix it multiple times. I hate you Epson.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive now.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why this product is so expensive now. When I bought it it was less than $40 and definitely worth it at that price point. Don't know about what they're charging for it now though.
customer_reviews.author: Hidaya

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Called the company as I seem to have trouble with cartridges since they do not last long. Need to keep all colors filled for it to operate. Way too expensive when I only need black. Will throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Will not print
customer_reviews.text: I printer did not last thru the first ink cartridge. I need my printer to work because I am working from home due to the covid 19. I have replaced the black ink cartridge and I am still not able to get a legible print. I have had epson printers before but this one has me looking for another brand. Wonder if there is a warranty
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, ink eater
customer_reviews.text: Constantly says it's out of ink, even if cartridge has been recently replaced and barely used. Often need to power off then power back on before printing works.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Styles

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a year of light use
customer_reviews.text: Terrible printer. Broke after one year of very light use.
customer_reviews.author: Manndi s.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily and bad wifi connection
customer_reviews.text: This product is really bad. Unless you're using it daily, the cartridges dry out and clog the mechanism. The clean cycle doesn't fix it and it's impossible to clean it yourself. Basically rendered useless. I've had it for 3 years, but it crapped out after 1.5 years. It's also very unreliable for wifi printing. Difficult to connect.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Black Cartridge NO LONGER recognized after only 14 Months and MINIMAL usage!
customer_reviews.text: After only about 13 months and MINIMAL USE, it no longer recognizes black ink cartridges. The cartridge is an OEM Epson cartridge NOT and aftermarket. Just bought a whole set of ink cartridges for more than 100 dollars 1 month ago...what a waste. Epson used to be a high quality product, now it seems just another run of the mill printers...oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Had a Epson printer for many years so when it died I ordered another Epson. Had this for over 1 1/2 years and nothing but trouble. It leaves off whole sentences and skips every other one. Hard to understand directions. And no book comes with it. Have to go online to read instructions. All in all, always have to correct something with it.
customer_reviews.author: georjean brasch

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer for two years and I rarely use it. It never works, the ink runs out way too quickly. I'm just going to buy a new one. This is way too much hassle. I'm disappointed, don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hasenau

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy. But ink refills will make a dent in your wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought printer while on sale. Biggest shock was when I had to buy ink refills which cost same price or higher price than the printer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase - only worked for a few months
customer_reviews.text: This barely worked. It was a huge waste of money. It’s size and weight were as expected. It’s use was worth about 3 prints. After that it never worked again. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: i would give 0 stars if i could
customer_reviews.text: utter garbage, every time i try and print something its a pain. complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Deeply regret
customer_reviews.text: Won't print in just black. You must replace ALL the color cartridges, which dry out pretty quickly. Very bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen Ax

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: World's absolute worst printer. It's a struggle to just get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Emigh

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of ink
customer_reviews.text: Very nice printer for the money. Uses ink very fast I think. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: pmo55

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage! Have had nothing but problems and it eats ink like crazy!!! Beware!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaK

customer_reviews.title: I gave up on this thing
customer_reviews.text: It does not want to connect to my Mac. Sick of the constant updates. I guess this is a problem with Epson. Picture quality poor. The pigment based ink dries up quickly. Never again
customer_reviews.author: A. Jarry

customer_reviews.title: This is literally the worst printer I've ever owned and now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time buying this piece of junk. $160 down the drain. It has never printed in color, despite everything being installed correctly. It rarely works, and if it does you can barely read what it prints because the ink is so light on the paper. Literally the worst printer on the planet. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mainini

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 years and Kaput
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why this happens but it is exactly like everyone said. and I'm not even a hard core user!
customer_reviews.author: kristin juel

customer_reviews.title: Print it up
customer_reviews.text: Best price and worksreally need great. Don’t pay more for options you don’t
customer_reviews.author: Richard Foote

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this printer. Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. This printer is not worth buying. Almost every time I try to print it is faded right streaked and the cartridges have to be realigned wasting ink. It won’t print in black if all the cartridges are not installed or full. It has been more trouble than it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT IS GOOD FOR ABOUT 3 MONTHS THEN THE BLACK STOPS WORKING!!! I'M PISSED
customer_reviews.author: Aujah

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Ink User
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this printer for 3 years now, and I regret my purchase. While it prints fine, this machine eats ink quick. You'll be buying ink every other week with this printer. It will save you money to buy a much more expensive printer.
customer_reviews.author: Armia

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ended up getting rid of this. Frustrating with multiple issues even after bought new ink.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about three years
customer_reviews.text: We just hit the three year mark and it died on me.
customer_reviews.author: SharonGill2357

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but sometimes gets confused and everything slows down
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Printer review
customer_reviews.text: Great printer but uses way too much ink even after changing printer settings
customer_reviews.author: jd cruze

customer_reviews.title: Bought to save ink, doesn't end up helping
customer_reviews.text: If you don't use it every week or two, the ink head, at least the black one, gets super messy. I basically have to clean the print head each time I want to use it. Looking at going back to an HP printer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Ortego

customer_reviews.title: Epson xp-330 printer
customer_reviews.text: Using a lot of ink, I believe more than it should until it tore up and now it blurrers and streaks every other line that it prints. I have had this printer one year and ten months. Printer the worst I ever own. Robert
customer_reviews.author: robstar 505

customer_reviews.title: Ink heads clog easily
customer_reviews.text: If you print regularly (multiple times per week) this device may be good value. But its just not worth it for occasional usage. The ink jets are always clogged when I need to print. Now the head cleaning feature won't even resolve the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: This printer did not perform well. It was useless after one year and had to be replaced. Customer Service suggestions did not resolve problem. It kept saying "paper jam" when, in fact, there was not a paper jam. Took it for repair and they were not able to resolve problem. :(
customer_reviews.author: Grmabee

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Printing is full of streaks, even after trying to clean print heads multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Decker

customer_reviews.title: JUNK PRINTER-do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This printer is total piece of crap! With in the first year-stopped printing in color or black and white. Only yellow and green. $60 for ink cartridges-WASTED. This is JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Joselove

customer_reviews.title: What more to say
customer_reviews.text: I must say to be used it works great thanks people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase of my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product ever! It's not just money but you'd waste your time and energy. I would give a -5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan

customer_reviews.title: PAPER GETS LOADED UPRIGHT  WEIRD
customer_reviews.text: DIDNT LIKE THE WAY THE PAPER LOADED VERY STRANGE AND QUALITY OF PRINTS WAS NOT GOOD .
customer_reviews.author: John F. Driscoll Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working 8 months after purchase and the ink went so fast when I used it. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of junk. It uses to much ink and doesn’t work well at all. I don’t have many regrets but this is one of them!! Save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The printer stopped working after a year. Ate up ink like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while and then all of the sudden has serious issues with printing, despite following all maintenance procedures.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Wastes ink like crazy
customer_reviews.text: It's annoying to deal with. We only ever printed in Black but it says it's wasting all colors and doesn't even let you print in Black if ANY cartridge is "empty".
customer_reviews.author: Germ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: WORTHLESS, USELESS. DOESNT PRINT ANYTHING CLEAR AND THE INK FINISHES VERY QUICKLY. PLEASE SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: We take it on trips to print out our own postcards to send to family and friends. It is lightweight and does a fairly good job.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy I.

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product ever. Broke down and even their service center couldn't fix it and asked me to recycle. This is pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Ray

customer_reviews.title: Bricked!
customer_reviews.text: Firmware update in August 2020 bricked my printer until I buy Epson branded ink cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy this model!
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't feed paper! I returned it same day I un-packed it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a new printer head.
customer_reviews.text: This printer did not last two years. The printer head needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself headache and money by not getting this printer. As other reviewers have mentioned, this printer doesnt work as expected
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Do not get this
customer_reviews.text: The minute I got it it was broke. Do not get this printer.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: good printer for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very satisvied with product ,black is dark and bright color and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: The Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good printer
customer_reviews.text: I love this printer had one before and loved it
customer_reviews.author: Cathyfallis

customer_reviews.title: Dont bother
customer_reviews.text: This printer is an absolute waste of money. the wifi printing feature never works. The scanner only functions occasionally. It uses tons of ink. Will not be buying an Epson product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Beam

customer_reviews.title: Great machine ,just make sure it's level.
customer_reviews.text: Great running printer,but if you loose power you have to reset up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Epson Expression Home Xp-330 Wireless Color Photo Printer with Scanner and Copier, Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
product_meta.description: Style:PrinterCompact and affordable, the expression Home xp-330 Small-in-One printer makes printing simple. Its 1.44" Color LCD offers quick, easy setup. Print from virtually anywhere, with or without a network ‐ even from your iPad, iPhone, Android tablet or smartphone. The xp-330 is a complete wireless solution. A 100-sheet paper capacity means you'll reload paper less often, while individual inks allow you to replace only the color you need. Plus, you’ ll get truly touchable photos and documents — Instant-dry ink delivers smudge, fade and water resistant prints. And, a built-in memory card slot ensures simple, PC-free photo printing. This Epson printer is designed for use with only genuine Epson-brand cartridges. Other brands of ink cartridges and ink supplies are not compatible and, even if described as Compatible, may not function properly or at all. Epson provides information about the design of the printer on the box and in many other locations and materials Included with the printer and on the website. Epson periodically provides firmware updates to address issues of security, performance, minor bug fixes and ensure the printer functions as designed. This printer was designed to work only with genuine Epson ink cartridges and some updates may affect the functionality of third party ink. Non-epson branded or Altered Epson cartridges that functioned prior to a firmware update may not continue to function.
feature_bullets: This printer is designed for use with Epson cartridges only, not third party cartridges or ink. Cartridges described as Compatible, Remanufactured, refilled or refillable may not work properly or at all. See product description for more details.
Complete wireless solution — easy iPad, iPhone, Android tablet and smartphone printing; Includes Wi-Fi Direct for network-free printing.
Affordable individual ink cartridges — replace only the color you need.
Reload paper less often — 100-sheet paper capacity.
Truly touchable photos and documents — Instant-dry ink for smudge, fade and water resistant prints.
Never run out of ink again - printer features Amazon Dash Replenishment which, after activation, keeps track of your ink usage and orders more from Amazon when you are running low.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars369 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
